extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     CISC322 and CISC325 
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from CISC423; SOFT423

basic.description: An integrated approach to discovering and documenting software requirements. Identification of stakeholders; customer, operator, analyst, and developer perspectives. Requirements elicitation. Transition from initial (informal) requirements to semi-formal and formal representations. Requirements analysis process; analysis patterns. Requirements analysis process; analysis patterns. Requirements specification techniques. Relation to architecture and user interface design; traceability of requirements.  Alternately offered as CISC 423/3.0.
basic.subject: SOFT
basic.title: Software Requirements
